page.title: 18ASHCRAIG SECONDARY SCHOOL 2
page.content:
A staff of 17 full-time and 13 part-time teachers are supported by 28 ancillary staff who cater for all the needs and requirements of the 148 pupils attending the school. Each day, 33 Regional buses and taxis transport 145 of the pupils from all over Strathclyde Region to and from school. Only two pupils live locally, and one travels from Central region. The head teacher is{Mrs. Agnes Allan who was awarded the{M.B.E.}in the 1985 New Year's Honours List for her services to Education.
During session 1984-85, 45 senior pupils were presented for 'O'Grade and Higher grade examinations in a wide variety of examinable subjects. Pupils from other secondary schools in the area travelled to Ashcraig to study higher German and Home Economics.
